Ingredients: Lemon juice, honey, garlic, and other herbs (all optional)
Instructions: Cut sunchokes into half-centimeter-thick pieces. Toss all the ingredients together, then bake them at 400F for 20 minutes. Stir, then bake for another 15 minutes.
Serving suggestion: Eat this as a side dish, or mix it into a Greek salad.
Notes: Sunchokes are delicious, but they contain inulin, which can cause digestive problems. So don't eat to much, or you'll feel it the next day.
